--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> No much,
> 
> Malice still is inside the Blackfortress, Battle Preds vs maximals 
> are outside and Azure is atemping to freed Nightlight. 

In addition to that - 

The Maximal crew that had been heading to the ark, they have
successfully paused to run off Nightrazor who had been shadowing them,
and are now resuming thier course to the ark. 

Meanwhile the minions who had been racing them there had reached the
ark ahead of them. However they were fired upon by someone who looked
like a black and red version Shockblast. Deepstryke was gravely wounded
in the attack. 

The Ark intruder alert alarms went off, but then abruptly stopped.

Airly, will you be having your characters act before I continue?

Preston
